ATK DEF HP +16%
+2% Accuracy
+1 Chain Passive Weakness Gauge damage
transcend.6:
ATK DEF HP +30%

SKT_FIRST.name: Snow Rabbit Pursuit
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy and has a <color=#28d9ed>30%</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Marked</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.
description: Attacks an enemy and has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000011_1_1]</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Marked</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000011_1_1] turn(s)</color>.

SKT_SECOND.name: Fox Hunt
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: Attacks a single enemy and has a <color=#28d9ed>35%</color> chance to activate a <color=#28d9ed>Dual Attack</color> from the ally with the highest Attack.
description: Attacks a single enemy and has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000011_2_1]</color> chance to activate a <color=#28d9ed>Dual Attack</color> from the ally with the highest Attack.

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Bear Hunt
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Attacks all enemies and has a <color=#28d9ed>70%</color> chance to reduce the target's <color=#28d9ed>Attack</color> for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.
description: Attacks all enemies and has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000011_3_1]</color> chance to reduce the target's <color=#28d9ed>Attack</color> for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000011_3_1] turn(s)</color>.

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>100%</color> chance to inflict Marked on the target for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>50%</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Marked</color> on the target.
description: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000011_chain_1_1]</color> chance to inflict Marked on the target for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000011_chain_1_1] turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000011_backup_1_1]</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Marked</color> on the target.

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
3: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
4: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
5: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
